welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Yomitan, Japan! Known for its serene beaches, rich culture and delicious local cuisine, we invite you to immerse yourself in the charm of our city and make unforgettable memories during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kadena AB Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kadena AB Airport handles all cargo operations and freight flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Naha Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Naha Airport serves flights within Japan.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Naha Airport serves flights to and from other countries.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. No password is required.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Iejima Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Iejima Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
